QuestData.Title: Overwhelming Power
QuestData.Description: We will find no sanctuary on this world. Even now the full might of the Burning Legion rises to defend Argus.$B$BThe siege camp below overflows with demon filth that stand between us and the weapon trained on the Vindicaar.$B$BThey must be dealt with before it can fully charge, or Argus will be our grave.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Meet Illidan Stormrage at the Crown of Destruction.
